channel.title: NPC dialouge [317]
channel.description:
ok,
i have npcs talking but ill make some npcs say 3 or 4 things and they only say 2 then stop and the third or fourth dialouge just doesnt show,
how can i make the npcs keep talking and say all the things?
also how can i make a choice selection or have the character talk to him?
im on a 317 delta base

item.title: NPC dialouge [317]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:2, topic:337751”]Look for Case 40 in NPC dialogue and you will see a list of different dialogues that have previously been set. You will need to add something like this

if (NpcDialogue == 499) { NpcDialogue = 500; choice("Yes", "No"); }

Cbf explaining the rest, look for a tut.[/quote]

ok thanks, i know what to do from there…

ill try this out, i think thats what i was doing wrong

but anyone else know why the npc isnt getting past the 2nd dialogue? some npcs do but most dont and idk why

Read full topic

item.title: NPC dialouge [317]
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Look for Case 40 in NPC dialogue and you will see a list of different dialogues that have previously been set. You will need to add something like this

if (NpcDialogue == 499) { NpcDialogue = 500; choice("Yes", "No"); }

Cbf explaining the rest, look for a tut.

Read full topic
